prompt.content: Based on GOOGL’s 10-Q Cash Flow Statements, did the company's FCF Conversion of Net Income to Common improve or worsen YoY for the Q2-FY2025 period? By how much? Define FCF as OCF - Capex. Express your answer as a percentage, rounded to two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Recognizes that FCF needs to be computed by subtracting CapEx from OCF."},{"criteria":"Recognizes that Q2 figures need to be obtained by differencing H1 and Q1","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2025 H1 OCF = 63,897","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2025 H1 CapEx = 39,643","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2025 Q1 OCF = 36,150","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2025 Q1 CapEx = 17,197"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2025 OCF = 27,747","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2025 CapEx = 22,446","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2025 FCF = 5,301","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2025 Net income to common = 28,196","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2025 FCF conversion = 18.80%","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 H1 OCF = 55,488","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 H1 CapEx = 25,198","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 Q1 OCF = 28,848","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 Q1 CapEx = 12,012"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2024 OCF = 26,640","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q2-FY2024 CapEx = 13,186"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2024 FCF = 13,454","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2-FY2024 Net income to common = 23,619","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Q2-FY2024 FCF conversion = 56.96%"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"YoY change in FCF conversion (Q2-25 − Q2-24) = −38.16 percentage points"},{"criteria":"Final conclusion: FCF conversion worsened YoY by 38.16%","operator":"correctness"}]
